entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: N 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
